summary.span: 提供与 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器相关的类型。

span.span: Provides types that relate to XAML readers and XAML writers.

summary.span: 这包括 .NET XAML 服务及其 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器的默认实现。

span.span: This includes the default implementations of .NET XAML Services and its XAML readers and XAML writers.

summary.span: 还包含与 XAML 类型系统相关的类型以及与 XAML 和 .NET XAML 服务概念相关的其他支持类型。

span.span: Also contains types relevant to the XAML type system and other support types related to XAML and .NET XAML Services concepts.
